Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Westbound Reroute near Diversey/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Westbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey due to fire department activity near Diversey/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey due to fire department activity near Diversey/Milwaukee.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
